title: Risk Factors Associated with Low Infant Birth Weight
description:
Description
The birthwt data frame has 189 rows and 10 columns.
The data were collected at Baystate Medical Center, Springfield, Mass
during 1986.
reference:
Hosmer, D.W. and Lemeshow, S. (1989)
Applied Logistic Regression. New York: Wiley

parameters.low: indicator of birth weight less than 2.5 kg.
parameters.ftv: number of physician visits during the first trimester.
parameters.lwt: mother's weight in pounds at last menstrual period.

format: This data frame contains the following columns:
